help-monitoring-post-memo1.description: Screenshot of the view ineligible students screen for unsatisfactory GPA. The first table, listing students being automatically handled under the heading 'Unsatisfactory GPA,' is empty. After that, under the heading 'Flagged after memo 1,' the text reads 'Students listed here were flagged subsequent to the memo 1 process and will require manual handling to terminate their placements.'
